alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 3:30PM AKST until January 28 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing rain and snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches from Bethel and areas to the west. Ice accumulations of a trace to one tenth of an inch for areas south and east of Bethel. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...From noon Friday to midnight AKST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A warmer air mass begins to move into the Kuskokwim Delta on Friday. Areas from Bethel and to the west, will remain cool enough to see all snow, with accumulations of up to 3 to 5 inches. To the south and east of Bethel, however, snow should quickly transition to freezing rain in the afternoon, becoming all rain by midnight Friday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
